pyzui.dynamictileprovider module¶

Class for loading tiles into memory from somewhere other than the local filesystem (abstract base class).

class pyzui.dynamictileprovider.DynamicTileProvider(tilecache)[source]¶

Bases: TileProvider

DynamicTileProvider objects are used for either generating tiles or loading them from a remote host, and then loading them into a TileCache.

Constructor: DynamicTileProvider(TileCache)

Create a new TileProvider for loading tiles into the given tilecache.

filext = 'png'¶
tilesize = 256¶
aspect_ratio = 1.0¶
_load_dynamic(tile_id, outfile)[source]¶

Perform whatever actions necessary to load the tile identified by the given tile_id into the location given by outfile.

_load_dynamic(tuple<string,int,int,int>, string)

_load(tile_id)[source]¶

Load the requested tile, and return it as an Image object.

Returns None if the tile does not exist.

_load(tuple<string,int,int,int>) -> Image or None
